Description: Clay tablet; nearly complete; adoption and marriage contract; Old Babylonian.
Bibliographic references: Walker 1980c / Some Assyrians at Sippar in the Old Babylonian period
Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.222)
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
